summary: Magaraz the Orc, An Orc fresh out of the Orc Stronghold Dushnikh Yal to seek his fortune, who has gone to the town of Riverwood in the "Sleeping Giant Inn" awaiting for an Adventurer in need of assistance.
descriptionHtml: Magaraz the Orc, An Orc fresh out of the Orc Stronghold Dushnikh Yal to seek his fortune, who has gone to the town of Riverwood in the "Sleeping Giant Inn" awaiting for an Adventurer in need of assistance. He uses a Two handed Steel Battle Axe, the Conjuration Spell Summon Storm Atronach, and a full set of Steel armor. Right from the first second you invite him to join you he'll make you friendly with all Orc Strongholds, He'll also equip anything better than what he currently has equiped.
author: Dominic Michael Harden
